traits.name: Charge
entries: If Zegdar moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Zegdar can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
